Upland is a blockchain-based metaverse where players can buy, sell, and trade virtual properties mapped to the real world.
Collections in Upland are groups of properties that players can complete to earn boosted earnings and other rewards.
UPX is the in-game currency used in Upland for transactions such as buying properties and participating in activities.
Treasure hunts in Upland are timed events where players search for hidden treasures to win UPX or other prizes.
Upland operates on the EOS blockchain, ensuring transparency and ownership security for all players.
Players in Upland can own virtual properties linked to real-world addresses, which generate passive income over time.
To level up in Upland, players need to increase their net worth by acquiring properties and completing collections.
A node in Upland is a player-organized community focused on developing and enhancing specific neighborhoods or areas.
MetaVentures in Upland are player-run businesses that allow users to sell custom assets, Legits, and other items.
